timeline.message: Add migration path indexer option to index directories of files
Allow md5s to be passed in with manifests

Add transformer for migrating and populating deposit records.

Downgrade h2 slightly due to compatibility with modeshape.

Fix issue with populating typed literals during sparql query generation
Add command for retrieving all paths in the index, useful for debugging
Fix bugs with deposit record transformation, add helper method for building ingest source managers in tests
Add command and infrastructure for performing deposit record transformations. Allow for integration tests of subcommands. Initialize deposit record base path constant.
Allow connections to close before making additional requests during object creation, to avoid exhausting the connection pool
Allow connections to close before making additional requests during object creation, to avoid exhausting the connection pool
